name: Star Maverick 64
description:
Space Soup (working title) is a small retro arcade space shooter inspired by games such as Starfox, Rogue Squadron, Tie Fighter and Wing Commander and the systems those games ran on.

Launching Q3 2021.

Features:

  • Explosive and satisfying shoot-em-up action
  • Multiple interesting ships and weapons to unlock and use
  • Many and varied things to shoot at including capital ships and  boss fights
  • Nostalgic, low-fi aesthetic
  • Forgiving difficulty for those who want a more relaxing / cathartic experience, or for junior players
  • Open ended gameplay backed by fun characters and dialog
  • Windows, Linux and MacOS builds
